DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myToolTip: Create a waypoint and move to it
DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Create a waypoint at the chosen location and send the entity to it at the ordered speed.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="0"> <myVariableName>waypointLocation</myVariableName> <myType>location</myType> <myLabel>Waypoint Location</myLabel> <myToolTip>Where to create the waypoint</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="0"> <myVariableName>orderedSpeed</myVariableName> <myType>rate</myType> <myLabel>Ordered Speed</myLabel> <myToolTip>Speed at which to move to the waypoint</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>5.55556</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
